Staff & Board of Directors - Diamond Head Theatre Skip to content Box Office: (808) 733-0274 | Business Office: (808) 733-0277 Facebook Instagram YouTube LinkedIn Email Search for: Shows & Tickets Buy Tickets Season Subscriptions Seat Map Show Archive Subscriber Login Donate Annual Giving Capital Campaign Producer’s Club Sponsorship ‘Ilima Awards Auditions Show Auditions Shooting Stars Classes Year-Round Classes Summer Musical Theatre Experience Shooting Stars Instructors Scholarships About Staff & Board of Directors Instructors Volunteer Rentals News Show Archive Your New Theatre Theatrical Arts Building Make a Gift Sponsor a Seat Photos News Capital Campaign Donors Contact BUY TICKETS Staff & Board of Directors Jacque Vaughn 2025-07-23T06:29:51-10:00 STAFF & BOARD OF DIRECTORS We bring the magic of theatre to all Trevor Tamashiro, Executive Director Trevor joined Diamond Head Theatre as Executive Director in April 2023. Born and raised in Hawaii, and a graduate of Punahou School, he brings nearly 20 years of experience in nonprofit executive leadership. Trevor started his journey in New York City working for Broadway Dance Center. Other positions include: Chief Advancement Officer of The Diller-Quaile School of Music; Deputy Director of Saratoga International Theater Institute; and Deputy/Program Director for The Drama League of New York. Trevor is a member of the Association of Fundraising Professionals and is a Certified Fund Raising Executive (CFRE). He holds a degree in Theatre Arts from University of Miami, a Master of Business Administration degree from Pace University, and a Master of Science degree in Nonprofit Management from Columbia University. John Rampage, Artistic Director John Rampage is a performer, actor, choreographer, and director who has served as Diamond Head Theatre’s Artistic Director since 1995. He is the creative mastermind behind all of the theatre’s productions and programs, overseeing the curation of two or more shows each season and selects directors, musical directors, and set designers. His relationship with the theatre began in 1975 where he performed as Tommy Gilas in the 1975 production of Music Man. In the 1980s, Rampage danced and sang his way across the U.S. and Europe and returned in 1991 as choreographer of Evita. More than 120 productions have been shared with the community under his oversight. A 47-time Po‘okela Award winner for excellence in the theatre, John is also the recipient of the Hawaii State Theatre Council 2006 Pierre Bowman Award. Wo Steven Wong Vernon Wong Anna Steenerson Young Diamond Head Theatre is America’s third oldest continuously running community theatre. We are an independent nonprofit that relies on community support. Diamond Head Theatre recognizes the use of diacritical markings in the modern orthography of Hawaiian language. These markings may be omitted to give you the best experience with our website. 520 Makapuu Avenue Honolulu, Hawaii 96816 Box Office Hours: Monday through Friday 10 am to 4 pm Box Office: (808) 733-0274 Business Office: (808) 733-0277 Click Here to Email Us SIGN UP FOR E-NEWS Subscriber Login FOLLOW US © 2024 Diamond Head Theatre | All Rights Reserved | Privacy Policy | About Accessibility | Site created by Transcendence Pacific. Larson Awards Florida Tourism Hall of Fame Meeting Notices Careers Media News Releases Public Records Member Biography You are here: Home About Us Who We Are Florida Council of Tourism Leaders Member Biography William Talbert Title: Managing Director Organization: TALBERT GROUP INC Committee Position: Member William D. Talbert, III, CDME has served as President & CEO of the Greater Miami Convention & Visitors Bureau (GMCVB) for the past twenty years and Chief Operating Officer for the prior nine. His major accomplishments include assisting with the passage of the Travel Promotion Act of 2010; negotiating inter-local government funding agreements; preparing five successful Super Bowl bids, including the most recent bid for the NFL’s centennial year 2020 Super Bowl; and three Pow Wow bids. Under Talbert’s leadership, the GMCVB was awarded accreditation from the Destination Marketing Accreditation Program in November 2007. In June 2016, Talbert was appointed to the United States Commerce Department’s 2016-2018 Travel & Tourism Advisory Board.  He was reappointed for a second 2-year term in August 2018. The Board serves as the advisory body to the Secretary of Commerce on matters relating to the travel and tourism industry in the United States and offers recommendations on implementation of the National Travel and Tourism Strategy. In June 2016, Talbert become Chair of the VISIT FLORIDA Board of Directors for FY 2016-17. In his role as Chair, he also continued to serve on the Board's Executive Committee. VISIT FLORIDA is the state's official tourism marketing corporation and serves as Florida's official source for travel planning to visitors across the globe. He is a member of the U.S. Travel Association (USTA) Executive Committee and Brand USA Marketing Committee. He is also a board member of multiple Miami-based business and non-profit organizations. Talbert’s professional affiliations include past Chair of the Board of Directors of Destination International (DI), formerly known as Destination Marketing Association International. He also served as past Chair of DI Foundation Board of Trustees, and past Chair of the Florida Association of Destination Marketing Organizations (FADMO). Talbert holds a master’s degree in Public Administration from Florida Atlantic University and bachelor’s degree in Business Administration from the University of Florida. In 2006, he earned the Certified Destination Management Executive (CDME) designation – the highest educational achievement in the destination marketing industry. Contact us 101 North Monroe Street Suite 900 Tallahassee, Florida 32301 United States partner@VISITFLORIDA.org VISIT FLORIDA® is accredited by the Destination Marketing Accreditation Program (DMAP) of Destinations International. Audience Sites Visitors Meeting Planners Media Travel Professionals Copyright (2025) VISIT FLORIDA®. | Privacy Policy

Panorama Christian Center - About Us PANORAMA CHRISTIAN CENTER Welcome Who We Are About Our Senior Leader About PCC About Our App PCC Jamaica PCC Pakistan Next Steps Membership Definite Request Ministries Serve Teams DOMA Kingdom Alliance About DOMA Kingdom Alliance Watch Online Give Who We Are The Mission of Panorama Christian Center is the same mission Jesus gave His followers: "Go therefore and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit." - Matthew 28:19 What We Do The Vision of Panorama Christian Center is to create a community of authentic believers to witness a city transformed by the life chaining reality of the gospel, as people come to know Jesus as their Lord and Savior. What's Different As believers, we are the church. We believe in representing Jesus in the communities where we live. Jesus has empowered us to change our communities. At Panorama, it is our mission to "Build Communities By Building People" as we are Christ's voice, hands and feet of love to the world. Get Social With PCCMIAMI Get Social With PCCMIAMI Plan To Visit Us This Weekend Follow Us We would love to meet you this weekend during one of our following services: Sunday Worship: 8:00 AM EST Tuesday Bible Study: 7:00 PM EST 6073 NW 167th Street, Suite C-22, Miami Lakes, FL 33015 Senior Leader Senior Leader Emanu-el J. McKenzie TH.D is the President and Founder of Panorama Christian Center and has been in Ministry for over 40 years. God has graced Senior Leader Emanu-el J. McKenzie to cooperate with the Holy Spirit's Manifestation of the Prophetic, varied dimensions of Healings, and the Miraculous. Click Here to read more LET US KNOW YOU Click Here LET US KNOW YOU Click Here Visit Us Panorama Christian Center 6073 NW 167th Street, Suite C-22, Miami Lakes, FL 33015 Service Times Sunday Service 8:00 AM EST Tuesday Bible Study ONLINE ONLY 7:00 PM EST Contact Us (305) 698-0765 office@pccmiami.org Office Hours: Monday - Thursday 8:00 AM - 3:00 PM EST Friday 8:00AM - 12:00 PM EST Follow Us powered by SnapPages
